head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths GODDARD, RUTH R.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths GODDARD, RUTH R.

block.p: GODDARD-Ruth R. A memorial service for Ruth will be held on Wednesday, June 21st, at 11 AM at Bethel Chapel of Temple EmanuEl, 1 E. 65th St. between 5th and Madison. For more information, call the American Jewish Committee at 212-751-4000 ext. 206.

GODDARD-Ruth. She came into our lives 16 years ago and created a great impact through her character and love for us. She welcomed us into her family. She was a perfect woman and will be sadly missed by us all. Anita Adolphus Lynn and Christine Rosales
GODDARD-Ruth. For laughter, style, truth, standards and loyal friendship: she will be missed. Joan Sutton Straus

GODDARD-Ruth R. A memorial service for Ruth will be held on Wednesday, June 21st, at 11 AM at Bethel Chapel of Temple EmanuEl, 1 E. 65th St. between 5th and Madison. For more information, call the American Jewish Committee at 212-751-4000 ext. 206.

GODDARD-Ruth. She came into our lives 16 years ago and created a great impact through her character and love for us. She welcomed us into her family. She was a perfect woman and will be sadly missed by us all. Anita Adolphus Lynn and Christine Rosales
GODDARD-Ruth. For laughter, style, truth, standards and loyal friendship: she will be missed. Joan Sutton Straus
